wikipedia_page.main: Adrian Michael Berry, 4th Viscount Camrose (15 June 1937 – 19 April 2016) was a British hereditary peer, journalist, and global warming denier.

response: | Extant; inherited in 2001 by Adrian Berry, 4th Viscount Camrose
**Adrian Berry, 4th Viscount Camrose, 78, peer and journalist.
*Adrian Berry, 4th Viscount Camrose, 78, British journalist.Viscount Camrose – obituary

In 1936, she married Michael Berry who held positions at London newspapers, as editor-in-chief and chairman of The Sunday Telegraph and The Daily Telegraph. He was briefly 3rd Viscount Camrose before disclaiming the title. The couple had four children: Adrian Berry, 4th Viscount Camrose (1937–2016), Hon. Nicholas William Berry (1942–2016), Hon. Harriet Mary Margaret Berry (b. 1944), and Hon. Eleanor Agnes Berry (b. 1950).
